body:
Requested by Boom2010 on forum.

It would be really neat to have some sort of historical win/loss record.

Main parameters recorded might be :
- Date
- Win or loss
- Difficulty level

After that :
- color deck user (one, two or three)
- color deck AI (one, two or three)
- cube
- initial life
- etc

There could also be statistics :
- number of played games and duels
- number and percentage of wins 
- average number of game turns
- average remaining life when winning
- average AI life when losing
- etc
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Add more historical data overview to game

comments.body: Revision c96844bd5e added a history panel with basic statistics.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Revision c8a45ceeac added average turns played, remaining life for player and remaining life for AI. Revision a047ac9f6a added most used color.

I'm reluctant about storing the date as that would lead to an ever growing file and I don't really see the benefit.

**Summary:** Add more historical data overview to game  
  **Labels:** -Priority-Medium Priority-Low
